headline: Axon Enterprise (AXON) Valuation Check After Northcoast Buy Upgrade And Ongoing Revenue Momentum
summary: Axon Enterprise (AXON) attracted investor attention after Northcoast Research upgraded its rating on the stock to buy. This move coincided with strong recent revenue trends and increasing interest in Axon’s long-term, subscription-based public safety platform. See our latest analysis for Axon Enterprise. At a share price of US$631.69, Axon has recently seen strong upward momentum, with a 7 day share price return of 12.11% and a 30 day share price return of 11.14%, even though the 90 day share...
